lines.gurmukhi: dIpk pY Awvq pqMg pRIiq rIiq lig; dIp kir mhw ibprIq imly jwir hY [

Unknown.translation: A moth approaches a light out of love but the attitude of a lamp is to the contrary. It singes him to death.

lines.gurmukhi: Ail cil Awvq kml pY snyh kir; kml sMpt bwNiD pRwn prhwir hY [

Unknown.translation: Fulfilling his desire for love, a black bee approaches a lotus flower. But as the Sun sets, the lotus flower closes its petals and snuffs out life from the black bee.

lines.gurmukhi: mn bc kRm jl mIn ilvlIn giq; ibCurq rwiK n skq gih fwir hY [

Unknown.translation: It is the character of fish to stay in water but when a fisherman or angler catches it with the help of a net or a hook, and throws it out of the water, the water does not help it in anyway.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: mn bwxI srIr Bwv srb pRkwr kr ky mClI dI giq dSw jl ivKy ilvlIn snyh ivc mgn rhxw hY, pRMqU ibCuVn ligAwˆ bcw nhIˆ skdw, sgoˆ PV ky pry mwrdw hY, vw jd iSkwrI jwlI PV ky bwhr su`tdw hY qwˆ ivCuVidAwˆ bcw nhIˆ skdw[

lines.gurmukhi: duKdweI pRIiq kI pRqIiq kY mrY n trY; gurisK suKdweI pRIiq ikau ibswir hY [318[

Unknown.translation: Despite being one-sided, the painful love of moth, black bee and fish is full of faith and trust. Every lover dies for its beloved but doesn't give up loving. Contrary to this one-sided love, the love of Guru and his Sikh is two-sided. True Guru loves His
